title: Welcome to My Blog

title: Hello World, this is Murray's very first blog post!

Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Murray's second blog post!
contents: This post is almost TOO profound for the interwebs. I want to use this page eventually for announcements to CSULB Math/Stat students.
